c74object.name: zsa.rolloff~
c74object.digest: zsa.rolloff~ returns the spectral rollof point.
c74object.description: The spectral roll-off point is the frequency so that x% of the signal falls below this frequency. The object works in the spectral domain, so you need to use it whithin pfft~.

method.name: (mouse)
method.description: Double-clicking on the object causes the Zsa Descriptors splash screen to appear. You'll find the version number and date there.

method.name: signal
method.description: If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using cartopol~ or better zsa.energy~).

attribute.name: rolloff
attribute.description: rolloff sets the percentage energy accumulated value, x% (default = 0.95), to consider the roll-off frequency.
